title: How to Make Bath Beads

steps.headline: Gather the ingredients.
steps.description: Mix the dry ingredients in a large bowl with a wooden spoon.

steps.headline: Stir until evenly blended.
steps.description: Keep stirring gently, avoid spilling or creating excessive froth.

steps.headline: Add most of the orange water or rose water, approximately 3/4 and your selected oils - up tp10 drops depending on oil and your preference.
Choose an amount of food coloring to tint the bathwater.
steps.description: Remember this is optional; you can add the coloring for visual appeal.

steps.headline: Add water.
steps.description: Keep stirring the mixture and add as much water as needed until the mixture is thick enough to resemble clay.

steps.headline: Make beads.
steps.description: Hand roll the dough into small spherical shapes, about a teaspoon in size. Place balls on a sheet of wax paper or tinfoil on a flat surface. Allow the beads to dry for 1 day.
